text: evaraite vaddi tintaro! Vari sthiti (punarut'thana dinamuna) saitan takadam valla bhramaparacabadina vyakti sthiti vale untundi. Idi endukante! Varu: "Vyaparam kuda vaddi lantide!" Ani ceppadam. Kani allah vyaparanni dharma sam'matam (halal) cesadu mariyu vaddini nisid'dham (haram) cesadu. Kanuka tana prabhuvu cesina i hitabodha andina vyakti munmundu vaddi tinatam tyajiste, atadu purvam tinnadedo tinnadu. Atadi vyavaharamanta allah ke cendutundi. (I adesam taruvata i durvyavaharaniki) palpadevaru narakavasulavutaru. Akkada varu sasvatanga untaru
